product_name: Smith Hemline Sunglasses - Black Cherry - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Turning up the volume of the Shorewood model, the Black Cherry Hemline frames feature stylishly oversized lenses and bold temples, providing an extra dose of sun coverage and fabulousness.
